game.name: Demon Stick
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You are a demon trapped in a stick. A challenging game about crossing different levels of hell, inspired by the paintings of Hieronymus Bosch. Simple controls, endless falls, and no mercy.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are a demon trapped in a stick. A challenging game about crossing different levels of hell, inspired by the paintings of Hieronymus Bosch. Simple controls, endless falls, and no mercy.
